name: Prescient Grace
flavor: Gifted by a prescient vision, you warn an ally of an impending attack.
trigger: An enemy within 10 squares starts their turn.

metadata.flavor: Gifted by a prescient vision, you warn an ally of an impending attack.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You can spend a Recovery to allow the target to regain Stamina equal to your recovery value. The target can then take their turn immediately before the triggering enemy.
